author: Special Correspondent
text: The Southern Railway will operate a Suvidha special train from Chennai Egmore to Tirunelveli on March 6. The train (00653) will leave Chennai Egmore at 8.20 p.m. on March 6 and reach Tirunelveli at 9.45 a.m. the next day. The train will stop at Tambaram, Chengalpattu, Villupuram, Tiruchi, Dindigul, Madurai, Virudhunagar, Satur, and Kovilpatti. Advance reservation for the train is open.
title: Special train
